1.title: Actress Leonor Seixas
1.plot: Portuguese Actress Leonor Seixas shares her story on leaving her country of origin to come to the City of Angels in pursuit of her Dreams as an Actress.

2.title: TV Producer Morten Maansson
2.plot: Danish TV Producer Morten Maansson shares his story on dreaming to come to Hollywood as a teenager, how he became a huge success as a TV producer in Denmark and his journey to get to the City of angels in pursuit of continuing his Dream.

3.title: Actor Martin Dew
3.plot: British Actor Martin Dew shares his story on how the City of Angels came upon his path, how acting and the Hollywood industry thread through his life in the pursuit of his professional and artistic Dreams.

4.title: Composer Roman Kovalik
4.plot: Swiss Composer Roman Kovalik on how he got into music in his home of Switzerland and ended up doing his first job in Hollywood for an Oscar winning movie - The path his life took while in the pursuit of his professional and artistic Dreams.

5.title: Actress Karen Heaven
5.plot: Australian Actress Karen Heaven shares her journey on stumbling upon acting as a teenager, traveling the world to find herself right in the midst of the heart of Hollywood years later pursuing that teenage impulse that never left her.

imdb.plot outline: Discover International Entertainment Industry Professionals who left their country of origin to come to the City of Angels in pursuit of their Dreams. Actors, Directors, Editors, Producers, Composers and Foreign Industry Professionals sharing a peek inside how they came to Hollywood and what their story is in continuing to pursue their Dreams once they have arrived.
imdb.title: The Global Hollywood Show
plot: Discover International Entertainment Industry Professionals who left their country of origin to come to the City of Angels in pursuit of their Dreams. Actors, Directors, Editors, Producers, Composers and Foreign Industry Professionals sharing a peek inside how they came to Hollywood and what their story is in continuing to pursue their Dreams once they have arrived.::Lara Helena
